Html:
I've looked around a bit and have not found anything about this. I was wondering if the dev team had any plans to developed a a rawr version for iOS devices. I would love to be able to check out gear upgrades and optimize my gear on my iPod at work (on
 break of corse), where I do not have rawr, so that I'm done when I get home. A web based app would be great for this or if it's not to big a downloadable version would be perfect. I know this would probably be a little difficult but I was just winding if there
 were any plans in the future for something like this. If there was another discussion about this, sorry didn't see it =P Thanks
I've heard that Silverlight 5 will support iOS, which should be coming out before the end of this year I believe.

If your using Safari or Firefox on your iPod, you should be able to reach the Elitist Jerks Rawr site.

Edit: nevermind it's support but by way of a "hack".

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft_Silverlight#Compatibility
